title: FirstDialogue
body:
<<if $visited is false>>
<<set $visited to true>>
Hi!
I'm testing this awesome YarnSpinner plugin!
It's awesome, isn't it?

[[Yea, it's pretty cool!|Yes]]
[[I think it's lame...|No]]
<<elseif $actionItem is true and $givenItem is false>>
Wow you found it!
Can I have it please?
[[Yup, it's yours|yup]]
[[I have to think about it|nope]]

<<elseif $actionItem is false and $givenItem is false>>
Have you found it yet?
If yes, than open your inventory with "I"...
Than click on an item you want to use...
And finally try to talk with me again.
Also if you want to put your item back in the inventory, just press "R".

<<elseif $givenItem is true>>
You rock!
<<endif>>

title: Yes
body:
I knew that you'd like it!
[[Yup|tutorial]]

title: No
body:
Well I'm sure that eventually you'll come around.
[[...|tutorial]]

title: tutorial
body:
Now, can you bring me a heart from a room on the right?
I really like it.
The heart I mean...
When you'll stand near it press "E".
And please, don't speak to the other guy.
He's a big jerk...

title: yup
body:
<<removeItemYarn GM 3>>
Thanks duuuuude!
You're awesome!
<<set $givenItem to true>>

title: nope
body: I'll be here if you'll make up your mind
